text: Rich Eisen (born June 24, 1969) is a personality with the NFL Network. His jobs include: *NFL Network Studio Host *Thursday Night Football on-site host *KRCR-TV sports anchor/reporter *SportsCenter anchor *Beg, Borrow, & Deal Host *Domino Day Host *Baseball Tonight Host *MLB on ESPN Radio Studio Host *Tennis on CBS play-by-play/host *The Rich Eisen Podcast Host *The Great Escape Host Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Major League Baseball broadcasters Category:SportsCenter anchors and reporters Category:National Football League broadcasters Category:Tennis broadcasters
title: Rich Eisen
